Jourdanton City Council
=======================

All Mayor and City Council members correspondences can be mailed or delivered to:  
  
City of Jourdanton  
1604 SH 97 E Suite A  
Jourdanton, TX 78026

| Name | Title | Term | Contact |  |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Robert A Williams | Mayor | Nov 2024 - 2026 | [rwilliams@jourdantontexas.org](mailto:rwilliams@jourdantontexas.org) |  |
| Chester Gonzales | Mayor Pro Tem | Nov 2024 - 2026 | [cgonzales@jourdantontexas.org](mailto:cgonzales@jourdantontexas.org) |  |
| Karen Pesek | Council Member | Nov 2023 - 2025 | [kpesek@jourdantontexas.org](mailto:kpesek@jourdantontexas.org) |  |
| Pamela Manning | Council Member | Nov 2023 - 2025 | [pmanning@jourdantontexas.org](mailto:pmanning@jourdantontexas.org) |  |
| Raul Morales | Council Member | Nov 2024 - 2026 | [rmorales@jourdantontexas.org](mailto:rmorales@jourdantontexas.org) |  |
| Katrina Wiatrek | Council Member | Nov 2023 - 2025 | [kwiatrek@jourdantontexas.org](mailto:kwiatrek@jourdantontexas.org) |  |
